msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
textLineCreator property added to TextLineFactoryBase and arg removed from createTextLines
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
RichText - simplify assignment to textLineCreator to match how it was done in SimpleText
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

SimpleText and RichText now have a static mx_internal backgroundColor:Object property for debugging, like RichEditableText has had. It defaults to null, meaning no background. If you set it to a uint, the components will draw an opaque background so that you can see their bounds.
QE Notes: This property may be useful for testing as well as debugging.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

To make RichText more lightweight, it now uses the same technique as RichEditableText2 for its TLF hostFormat. In particular, it uses an object which is not actually a TextLayoutFormat, but instead simply implements ITextLayoutFormat by pulling the format properties directly from the component's CSS styles using getStyle(). This object is now implemented in a new CSSTextLayoutFormat class. It is smaller because it has only one var (for the object to call getStyle() on) rather than a var for every format property.

Also, the code in SimpleText, RichText, and RichEditableText2 for handling embedded fonts is now more uniform; all three classes use an identical getEmbeddedFontContext() method, which can eventually be factored into a base class or utility class after we determine the constellation of text classes that we'll ship with. I also made this code more efficient by using only a static instance of EmbeddedFont and TextFormat.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- Fix truncation. The measured resource indicator is width dependent so if it's cached it needs to be tossed if either the truncation indicator string changes or the width of the SimpleText changes.

- Fix measuredOneLine variable.  If it's SimpleText need to know if all the lines have been composed since simple text stops composing lines when it runs out of text or as soon as the next line completely falls outside of the bounds.
- Add missing config param to call to TextFilter.getImporter().  It was meant to be used.
- In RichText, the last one set, either text, or content, should take precedence.  Remove code which gave content precedence.
Reviewers: Gordon needs to review all of RichText/SimpleText when all the functionality is implemented
